text: Iván José Mayta Apaza (born 1 March 1999) is a Peruvian footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Peruvian Primera División side Cusco FC. ==Club career== ===Deportivo Binacional=== Mayta joined Deportivo Binacional in 2016 from Deportivo Municipal and was quickly promoted to the club's reserve team. In 2017, he began training with the first team.Ivan Mayta, joven arquero arequipeño de... - Tierra de ..., facebook.com, 3 March 2017 Helping Binacional to win the 2017 Copa Perú,Binacional campeón de la Copa Perú: la conmovedora historia del arquero y su mamá, depor.com, 11 December 2017 17-year old Mayta was promoted to the first team squad for the 2018 season. However, he wasn't able to break through and left the club at the end of the year. ===Los Caimanes=== On 27 March 2019 Peruvian Segunda División club, Los Caimanes, confirmed the signing of Mayta on a deal until the end of the season.Anunciamos el fichaje del arquero Iván Mayta..., twitter.com, 27 March 2019 He immediately became a regular starter for the club and played 20 games in total, with 46 conceded goals. Los Caimanes finished the season with an 11th place and was relegated to Copa Perú. ===Cusco=== Ahead of the 2020 season, Mayta joined Peruvian Primera División club Cusco FC.Cusco Fútbol Club anunció su plantel 2020, ovacion.pe, 30 December 2019 He got shirt number 12. ==International career== In March 2018, Mayta was called up to the Peruvian U20 national team after winning the 2017 Copa Perú with Deportivo Binacional.Selección sub-20: Iván Mayta, de Binacional, convocado al quinto microciclo, lanueve.com.pe, 30 March 2018 However, he never made his debut. ==References== ==External links== * * * Iván Mayta at Cusco FC's website Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Peruvian footballers Category:Peruvian Segunda División players Category:Deportivo Municipal footballers Category:Escuela Municipal Deportivo Binacional players Category:Los Caimanes footballers Category:Cusco FC footballers
title: Iván Mayta
